text:
The Invincible Power of Choosing to Choose

For too long, we have focused on external choices.

We have ignored our internal ability to choose.

This is more than just words.

Options can be taken away.

Our core ability to choose cannot be taken away.

Our free will remains intact.

The ability to choose cannot be taken away.

It cannot be given away.

It can only be forgotten.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** We often overlook our inherent ability to choose, focusing instead on external options that can be taken away.
